#summary Integrity is a [NeedStats need] in the AntiCultureWorld project.

==When too low==
The [Entity entity] dies

==When too high==
Nothing happens

==When is it increased?==
  * When the [Entity entity] is healed
  * When the [Entity entity] sleeps (not sure yet)
  * When the [Entity entity] eats (not sure yet)

==When is it decreased?==
When the [Entity entity] is injured
